attributes.action: All citizens to have the option of free percentage based Covid antibody tests.
attributes.additional_details:
I caught Covid19 last year, I have had a NHS antibody test, this only states that I had caught Covid19, however it does not stipulate what amount of immunity I have.
I paid privately for a test last year my reading of antibodies were at 50% 
However I had the same test this year and my readings were 78.8%
I have not had a vaccine this is from natural immunity. 
I think in the interests of science all citizens should have the right to this to give an accurate reading of actual immunity before considering the vaccine. 
I will be paying privately for this test again.
attributes.background: To put it through parliament on a vote to give the individuals of the nation an accurate antibody covid19 test.

rejection.details:
You may like to sign the below petition we currently have open on this topic:

Make Covid-19 antibody tests available for everyone
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/574386

The Government is currently running a mass antibody testing scheme and you can find out more here:
https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/coronavirus-covid-19-antibody-tests/coronavirus-covid-19-antibody-tests
